comment.text: Information is based on database description. Actual diagnose is missing
Other clinical features: This individual gave no history of systemic neisserial infections. He was found to be C6 deficient during a large scale screening among healthy blood donors.

consequence.term: deletion in the exon 3 leading to a premature stop codon in the TSP TYPE-1 1 domain
